remarks: Closure of the trace of a lattice translation.  (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2012.)
statement:
trlcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlcl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcl.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( R ` F ) e. B ) $.
